derivation: from G4862 (συνευωχέω) and a derivative of a presumed compound of G2095 (συνευωχέω) and a derivative of G2192 (συνευωχέω) (meaning to be in good condition, i.e. (by implication) to fare well, or feast);
strongs_def: to entertain sumptuously in company with, i.e. (middle voice or passive) to revel together
outline:
1. to entertain together
  2. to feast sumptuously with
